TopicTitle: Is there a list of parts that can be used in EVA construction

Articles.Content: Without testing each part one at a time, is there some way ot know which parts can and cannot be used in EVA construction (lets say in space, so we can ignore part weight)
I don’t know the specifics but I remember  hearing that the 1.875m monopropellant tank from making history is the largest part a kerbal can handle.
Not that I'm aware. However what was told is that some parts are "too big" so I assume(/guess) mass is the deciding factor
I think the “too big” is determined in each parts file, but yeah the devs probably just determined this based on mass.
